archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The William E. Garnett Papers consist of field notes, surveys, reports, class notes, letters to the editors of Montgomery County, Virginia, newspapers, and reprints of publications.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from William E. Garnett Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: William E. Garnett Papers, Ms1973-011, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The William E. Garnett Papers collection was acquired by Special Collections prior to 1973.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the William E. Garnett Papers was completed in 1973. Additional description was completed in March 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: William E. Garnett was a professor of Rural Sociology (1925-1956) at the Agricultural Experiment Station at Virginia Polytechnic Institute. He helped establish the Virginia Agriculture Conference Board and the Virginia Medical and Health Care Council.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The William E. Garnett Papers consist of field notes, surveys, reports, class notes, letters to the editors of Montgomery County, Virginia, newspapers, and reprints of publications.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College and Polytechnic Institute
Virginia Polytechnic Institute
